suppress.notes: Spring Framework 5.3.39 is the latest secure version compatible with Mule 4 Runtime. The identified Medium severity vulnerabilities (CVE-2024-38820, CVE-2024-38808) are related to specific Spring usage patterns (e.g., SpEL injection in specific contexts) not present in this application. This is an Accepted Risk until MuleSoft releases a runtime compatible with Spring 6.x.

Mule Module CORS Kernel 1.1.2 is the latest version pulled by the stable mule-http-connector 1.10.3. Version 1.2.0+ is not available in public repositories. The Critical vulnerabilities (e.g. CVE-2024-25124) are an Accepted Risk pending a vendor (Salesforce/MuleSoft) update.
